message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $95 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $75 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $85. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think!
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $80?
